={
  "language": "en",
  "locationQuery": "{{ $json.Location }}",
  "maxCrawledPlacesPerSearch": {{ $json['Limit the number of places per search term/URL'] }},
  "searchStringsArray": ["{{ $('On form submission').item.json['Search Term'] }}"],
  "skipClosedPlaces": false,
  "website": "withWebsite"
}

assignments.name: Limit the number of places per search term/URL

nodes.name: Website is a website not a fb page
Set correct domain format for merging

values.content:
=# Automated Quote System Cold Email Generator ## Objective Generate a **concise, persuasive HTML cold email** (without hard selling) to promote an automated system for: - Quote request responses - Site visit scheduling - Quote generation - Follow-up management ## Input Analysis Analyze **"""{{ $json.text.slice(0, Math.floor($json.text.length / 10)) }}"""** for: 1. Business type & services 2. Decision maker's first name (**required**) 3. Growth indicators or achievements 4. Evidence of manual processes/pain points 5. Company size & market position ## Output Format ```json { "website": "{{ $json.domain }}", "firstname": "decision maker name", "subject": "email subject", "emailBody": "

HTML formatted email

" } ``` ## Requirements 1. **HTML Formatting**: `

` & `
` tags, no greetings/sign-offs, mobile-friendly. 2. **Email Structure**: - 2-3 short paragraphs, **<100 words**. - Clear value proposition, industry relevance, & automation benefits. 3. **Subject**: - **≤50 characters**, intriguing, industry-specific, no generic phrases. 4. **Tone**: - **Professional, conversational, subtly persuasive** (no hard selling). 5. **Technical Constraints**: - **No apostrophes** - **Domain format unchanged** (`www` only if present in input) - **No output if first name missing** ## Example Outputs ### **Construction Company** ```json { "website": "buildmaster.com", "firstname": "Sarah", "subject": "200% faster quote responses", "emailBody": "

Your recent projects show BuildMaster’s efficiency.

Our system helps construction firms double site visit handling & cut quote response times by 200%.

Let’s explore how you can automate quotes while keeping a personal touch.

" } ``` ### **Real Estate Agency** ```json { "website": "premiumestates.com", "firstname": "Michael", "subject": "24/7 luxury property scheduling", "emailBody": "

Premium Estates excels in high-end marketing—imagine pairing that with instant view scheduling.

Our automation boosts luxury agency bookings by 40%.

Let me show you how it enhances your client experience.

" } ``` ### **Home Services** ```json { "website": "eliteservices.net", "firstname": "James", "subject": "3x faster quote response for Elite Services", "emailBody": "

Elite Services is known for fast responses.

Our system enables **instant** quotes & site visit scheduling—even at 2 AM.

Similar businesses improved conversion rates by 35%. Let’s talk.

" } ``` ## Key Success Factors ✅ **Industry-specific** (mentions achievements/pain points) ✅ **Clear value proposition** (time savings, 24/7 automation) ✅ **Low-commitment CTA** (clear next step)

nodes.name: Update person name, email body and subject

options.systemPromptTemplate:
You are an expert extraction algorithm.
Only extract relevant information from the text.
If you do not know the value of an attribute asked to extract, you may omit the attribute's value.

content.subject: Quote Automation for Amazing Plumbing
content.emailBody:
Amazing Plumbing excels in providing top-notch services throughout Cape Town, but what if you could enhance efficiency even further?

Our automated system streamlines quote requests, site scheduling, and follow-ups, allowing you to respond faster while maintaining the quality your customers trust.

content.subject: Enhance Your Plumbing Business with AI
content.emailBody:
Fast Drain Plumbing provides exceptional services, but imagine optimizing your workflow with AI.

Our intelligent tools automate customer interactions, booking management, and service follow-ups, reducing workload while increasing client satisfaction.

content.subject: Boost Customer Engagement with Automation
content.emailBody:
Cape Town Plumbing Pros stands out for reliability, but what if you could engage customers even better?

Our AI-driven system automates estimates, reminders, and customer support, ensuring a seamless experience while you focus on quality service.

content.subject: Streamline Your Plumbing Business Today
content.emailBody:
Pro Plumbing Fix has built a solid reputation, but manual tasks can slow growth.

Our AI-powered solutions handle scheduling, quotes, and reminders, freeing up time for your team to focus on what truly matters—exceptional service.

content.subject: AI-Powered Efficiency for Your Plumbing Business
content.emailBody:
Smart Drain Fixers provides excellent plumbing solutions—now it's time to take efficiency to the next level.

Our automation platform helps you manage inquiries, schedule jobs, and follow up with clients effortlessly.

content.subject: Maximize Your Plumbing Business Potential
content.emailBody:
Plumbers Elite has built a trusted name—now let’s maximize your potential with AI.

Automate your workflow, improve customer response times, and streamline service management with our cutting-edge solutions.
